tool_description:
All-In-One access to the BSC blockchain data!

More features are coming soon!

Feedback and feature requests should be sent to:
angleitnerchristoph123@gmail.com
name: Binance Smart Chain
title: Binance Smart Chain

api_list.name: Current Block Number
api_list.description: Get the current block number of the Binance Smart Chain!

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)

api_list.name: Account Balance
api_list.description: Get the BNB balance for an address on the Binance Smart Chain.

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)

api_list.name: Block
api_list.description: Get full data from a specific block on the Binance Smart Chain!

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)

api_list.name: Transaction
api_list.description: Get full data from a specific transaction on the Binance Smart Chain!

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)

api_list.name: Account Transaction History
api_list.description: Get an array of all transactions of an address on the Binance Smart Chain.

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)

api_list.name: Account Transaction Count
api_list.description: Get the number of transactions done by an address on the Binance Smart Chain.

optional_parameters.name: network
optional_parameters.description: Specify wich network you wanna use! (mainnet/testnet)
